## Discussion

If the `layerId` in the `playAnimation()` call is a non-zero value, the default behavior is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationHandoffType/compose] handoff . If the `layerId` is `0,` then the default behavior is a `snapshotAndReplace(applyToAllLayers: true)` handoff.

# default

**Type Property**

Provides the default behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
static var `default`: AnimationHandoffType { get }
```

## Discussion

If the `layerId` in the `playAnimation()` call is a non-zero value, the default behavior is a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationHandoffType/compose] handoff . If the `layerId` is `0,` then the default behavior is a `snapshotAndReplace(applyToAllLayers: true)` handoff.
title: default
